description.description: Description defines alert message, following code snippets could be used: {threshold} the value of the custom threshold that was violated {severity} the violating value {entityname} the display name of the entity where the metric violated {violating_samples} the number of violating samples that led to that event {dimensions} a string containg the violating dimensions of the metric {alert_condition} a string showing if above or below threshold is alerting

event_name.description: Event name displayed on UI pages.

samples.description: Size of the "window" in which violating_samples are counted.

violating_samples.description: The number of violating samples that rise an alert. Must be less that samples.

dealerting_samples.description: The number of not violating samples that deactivate and alert. Must be less that samples.
